changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `${table.prefix}user_bind` ( `id` bigint NOT NULL COMMENT '主键', `user_id` bigint NOT NULL COMMENT '用户ID', `external_key` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL COMMENT '外部ID', `created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '创建时间', `updated_at` timestamp NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT '更新时间', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) USING BTREE, KEY `k_user_id` (`user_id`) USING BTREE, KEY `k_external_key` (`external_key`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci COMMENT='用户外部系统绑定表';
